svg:
Academic Research Paper RDF Schema
Research Paper rdfs:Class
An academic research paper or work
Dataset rdfs:Class
A collection of data used for research or training
Method rdfs:Class
A methodology or approach used in research
Finding rdfs:Class
A result or discovery from the research
Contribution rdfs:Class
A novel contribution or innovation
Model rdfs:Class
A computational model or language model
Capability rdfs:Class
An ability demonstrated by a model or system
rdfs:Literal
introducesDataset
A dataset introduced by the paper
usesMethod
A method or approach used in the research
hasFinding
A finding or result from the research
hasContribution
A contribution made by the research
hasTitle
The title of the paper
hasAbstract
The abstract text of the paper
hasName
The name of the dataset or resource
contains
What the dataset contains
generatedBy
The tool or model that generated the dataset
targetedAt
The intended audience or use case
involves
What the method involves
demonstrates
What the finding demonstrates
concernsModel
A model that the finding is about
hasParameter
A parameter specification of the model
hasArchitecture
The architecture of the model
produces
What the model produces or outputs
hasCapability
A capability the model possesses
hasDescription
A description or explanation
hasType
The type or category
rdfs:domain
rdfs:range
rdfs:domain
rdfs:range
rdfs:domain
rdfs:range
rdfs:domain
rdfs:range
rdfs:domain
<path d="M 1395 120 Q="1100 105 920 105" class="edge"/>
rdfs:domain
property
property
property
property
property
property
property

property
property

rdfs:range
rdfs:range
rdfs:range
Legend:
Class (rdfs:Class)
Property (rdf:Property)
Literal Type
Schema Statistics: Classes: 7 (Paper, Dataset, Method, Finding, Contribution, Model, Capability) Properties: 18 - Object Properties: 6 (introducesDataset, usesMethod, hasFinding, hasContribution, concernsModel, hasCapability) - Datatype Properties: 12 (hasTitle, hasAbstract, hasName, contains, generatedBy, targetedAt, involves, demonstrates, hasParameter, hasArchitecture, produces, hasDescription, hasType)
function showInfo(id) { var box = document.getElementById(id + '-info-box'); var text = document.getElementById(id + '-info-text'); var text2 = document.getElementById(id + '-info-text2'); if (box) box.style.display = 'block'; if (text) text.style.display = 'block'; if (text2) text2.style.display = 'block'; }
function hideInfo(id) { var box = document.getElementById(id + '-info-box'); var text = document.getElementById(id + '-info-text'); var text2 = document.getElementById(id + '-info-text2'); if (box) box.style.display = 'none'; if (text) text.style.display = 'none'; if (text2) text2.style.display = 'none'; }
